backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point for the Internet Computer canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including login page, dashboard with sidebar/navbar/stats, projects table, upload progress form, and project details page with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including primary, secondary, and semantic colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading the React application with title 'AI-Assisted Construction Progress Monitoring System'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for login, dashboard, upload progress, and project details pages.
frontend/src/components/ComparisonSectio: Stage comparison component displaying previous stage (Foundation at 45%), current stage (Superstructure at 68%), and progress increase indicator with side-by-side images.
Reusable layout wrapper component providing sidebar navigation, top navbar, main content area, and footer with responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Responsive grid gallery component displaying construction progress images with hover effects and scale transitions.
frontend/src/components/ImageUpload.tsx: Drag-and-drop image upload component with file selection, preview list showing file names and sizes, and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Top navigation bar with mobile menu button, application title, and system status indicator showing active state.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Horizontal progress bar component with gradient fill and percentage display, positioning text inside or outside based on width.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsTable.ts: Displays a table of construction projects with mock data, showing project name, stage badges, progress bars, last updated time, and a button to navigate to project details.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Responsive sidebar navigation component with menu items (Dashboard, Upload, Projects), logout functionality, and mobile overlay support using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/StageBadge.tsx: Renders a colored badge for construction stages (Foundation, Superstructure, Facade, Interiors, Furnishing) with stage-specific color schemes.
frontend/src/components/StatCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a statistic with title, value, icon, and optional description in a styled layout.
frontend/src/components/TimelineChart.ts: Displays a line chart showing construction progress over time using Recharts with mock monthly data from January to June.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication support, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a deep blue government/enterprise theme with color tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a hero banner, three stat cards (total/active projects, last updated), and the projects table within a dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with email/password form that performs mock authentication and navigates to the dashboard on submit.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetails.tsx: Project details page displaying comprehensive project information including header with location/dates, progress overview with percentage and timeline, project statistics, timeline chart, image gallery, and before/after comparison section using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/UploadProgress.tsx: Upload progress form page with project selector, building count input, construction stage dropdown, image upload component, and form validation with success/error alerts that resets after successful submission.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system for UI components, custom animations for accordions, responsive container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting the AI-Assisted Construction Progress Monitoring System architecture, including React component structure, Tailwind styling approach, construction stages, existing features, and required placeholder images for the dashboard.
